pages.title: Jewelry Sizes
pages.text: Jewelry has three different sizes - regular (unnamed), Great and Lords, and each grants different buffs to the item.$(br).Regular is the default size and does not have a prefix.$(br2)$(l)Great$():$(br)Uses: $(3)2x$()
